description: AI4S Agent Tools Registry - A collection of MCP servers for scientific computing

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: Battery modeling, analysis and energy storage systems

climate.name: Climate
climate.description: Climate modeling, weather prediction and atmospheric sciences

medicine.name: Medicine
medicine.description: Medical research, drug discovery and healthcare applications

research.name: Research Tools
research.description: Literature search, documentation and knowledge management

tools.name: ABACUS
tools.description: First principles calculations bridge for AI models - ABACUS computational jobs
tools.author: @ahxbcn
tools.start_command:
# SSE mode
cd servers/ABACUS-tools && python server.py --port <PORT>
# stdio mode
cd servers/ABACUS-tools && MCP_TRANSPORT=stdio python server.py

tools.name: CatalysisMCP
tools.description: Catalysis reaction calculations based on ADSEC workflow
tools.author: @Rasic2
tools.start_command:

# stdio mode
cd servers/catalysis && MCP_TRANSPORT=stdio python server.py
